recipe_name: Smooth and creamy raspberry chia pudding
recipe_instructions: For the chia pudding 400g/14oz of full-fat crème fraîche (preferably organic) 6 tbsp chia seeds (available from health food stores) 2 tbsp vanilla extract 4 tsp honey, preferably raw, to taste 300g/10½ raspberries 20 drops pure stevia extract (available from health food stores) To garnish small handful toasted desiccated coconut or chopped almonds ½ unwaxed orange, grated zest only
